publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 79
ab.l: Miźmoru Asafnyn e Tenri keĺdiĺar ḥanlyḥlar üĺuš́uja murdar et́tiĺar aziź heḫalyjny qojdular Jerušalajimni pustalyḥ- larɣa.
B́erdiĺar ǵov́d́asiń qullaryjnyn jemǵa qušuna ol ḱok- ĺarniń gufun ḥasid́ĺarijniń kijigińa jerniń.
T́okt́uĺar qanlaryn suvlarny kibik č́uv́ŕaĺarińd́a Jerušalajimniń da joɣedi astravču.
Bolduḥ rusvajlyḥqa qonšularymyzɣa ilikḱa da śorč́akḱa č́uv́- ŕaĺarimiźd́a.
Qačanɣa dejiń e H ačuvlanyrsyn öḿurǵa dejinmo janar ot kibik ḱuńuĺuǵuj.
T́okḱuń qaḥirijni ol ḥanlyḥlar üśt́uńa ki biĺmejdirĺar śeni da bijlikĺar üśt́uńa šemija śeniń čaɣyrmadylar.
Ki tavustu eliń Jaʿaqovnun da ornun anyn v́eŕań et́ti.
Saɣynmaɣyn biźǵa burunɣu jazyḥlarny t́eźč́a utrulasyn- lar biźni raḥmet́ĺarij ki jarlylandyḥ astry.
Bolušḥun biźǵa jarly- ɣašly Teńrimiź syjly šemij üč́uń da qutḥarɣyn biźni da bošatḥyn jazyḥlarymyzny šemij üč́uń.
Ńeǵa ajtadyrlar ol ḥanlyḥlar qajda- dyr Teńriĺari biĺgili bolsun ḥanlyḥlarda ḱoźĺarimiźč́a öč́uń qanyn qullaryjnyn ol t́oǵuĺǵań.
Keĺsiń alnyja ińčyḥyrmaɣy zyndančynyn ulluluɣuna ḱoŕa quvatyjnyn jeb́ergiń öĺumĺu eĺni.
Da qajttyrɣyn qonšularymyzɣa jedi anč́a qojunlaryna rusvajlyḥ- laryn ki rusvajladylar śeni e H.
Da biź ulusuj da ḱut́uĺḿuš́ qojuj š́uḱur et́arbiź saja dunjaɣa dejiń dordan dorɣa dejiń jomaḥ- larbyz maḥtavujnu.
